1.10.text:
Hello Friends... Welcome!
(Turn Off Subtitles Below)

2.79.text:
Today I am here with Jess!
"Hiya!"

5.91.text:
and we are going to be doing and a healing 
demonstration for you come tutorial,

10.13.text:
Just to give you the general 
way of giving healing.

13.34.text:
Each healing finds their 
own way of doing it!

18.16.text:
if a patient has got dangly 
earrings on or glasses,

21.91.text:
or something might obstruct when your healing, 
because you have got your eyes close.

25.47.text: You can ask them to take that off,

27.33.text:
and also, healing will pass through 
clothing no problem at all!

33.57.text:
You ask them to take of a large jacket, 
if they have a large jacket on of course,

38.06.text: but if it is cold tell them to keep it on.

40.40.text:
The other thing is flowers, you do not want live
 flowers in the room because of allergies and stuff.

46.36.text:
So you just try to keep 
you patient relaxed as well.

51.10.text:
It is important to take shower, change 
your clothes before you do healing,

55.13.text:
because if you smell of smoke like I usually do, 
or you have a smelly dog or something,

60.95.text: That's quite off putting to the patient.

65.02.text:
You can also put some music 
on in the background.

67.55.text:
Which I not in this video, because its a 
healing meditation and its going to be 
on YouTube and such like.

76.13.text: So if Jess can lay down here.

78.94.text:
Put your arms by your side, 
just keep your eyes open for now.

82.68.text: So I am just going behind now.

85.04.text: The thing we want to do to begin with,

87.31.text:
is to, tune in to where we believe 
that healing is coming from.

93.05.text:
Some the healing powers come from God 
and other people believe, such as Reiki healers,

101.47.text:
So you just link in, 
to what ever you believe.

104.74.text:
and you can ask for healing 
to the specific patients needs.

108.50.text:
So just before you start you 
can say to the patient,

111.82.text:
Do you know of anything you 
specifically need healing for?

115.76.text:
No! So she is fine, she just needs 
a general healing that's fine.

119.49.text:
So those people when 
you are healing them,

122.50.text:
what you to heal what is wrong 
with them don't they!

125.16.text:
So! Other than that you 
give a general healing,

128.20.text: which is holistic, the complete spirit.

133.02.text:
it comes from spirit,
through a spirit guide healer,

136.34.text:
through your spirit, 
to the spirit of the patient.

138.98.text:
It heals the depletion of in the patient
and then passes onto the physical body or mind.

143.88.text:
So it is important to get your 
patient relaxed to begin with.

151.34.text:
Whatever you have got wrong 
with you mentally or physically,

154.20.text: its all going to be in the mind.

155.67.text:
So the thing you need to 
heal first is the mind.

158.55.text: Just to help the person calm down.

160.63.text: So I will just say to Jess,

162.61.text:
are you happy with me giving 
you hands on healing?

165.72.text:
and also to your stomach area?
"Yep Fine!"

167.96.text:
Because I can give hand off if not?
"That's alright"

171.58.text:
So just close your eyes 
and just try and relax...

175.80.text:
and you can take yourself off to 
some nice place somewhere...

179.38.text:
and we are going to begin to tune 
in and just send the healing rays.

184.75.text:
So nice and gently, 
begin to healing the mind.

189.22.text:
Because, once the patient is relax, 
they will except healing a lot better.

202.51.text:
So what to heal the heads 
for about 5 minutes.

209.14.text:
This is going to be quite a quick demonstration, 
because we are just demonstrating it today.

221.49.text:
So when begin healing, what you will 
feel is, the energy building up inside of you,

228.32.text:
and then begin to flow to the patient and
that is the best way to give healing,

233.54.text: just let it flow like and open tap.

235.49.text:
So you are the tap and the healing
come through you to the patient,

238.69.text: just like water going through and tap.

240.71.text:
So you just let it flow with your love 
and with your compassion to the patient.

251.58.text:
So we just healing in 
non sensitive areas.

254.76.text:
So you can your hand just on the forehead
and across the front of the face.

260.16.text: Keep your hands off the face.

262.75.text:
So just on the forehead, you do not need to, 
put too much weight on their head.

267.95.text: So that is heading the brain.

269.72.text: The over the face, is healing the eyes...

273.54.text:
and all the throat, nose, teeth,
anything that needs healing.

285.04.text:
So you spend about 5 minutes 
in total on the head.

288.51.text:
If a person if suffering anxiety or stress,
maybe a little bit longer.

293.73.text:
Most healings will actually only 
take you, 15 to 30 minutes.

298.35.text:
If a patient has a specific need, you 
spend a little bit longer in that area.

302.45.text: So do not put your hand on the throat.

308.23.text: So you heal the top of the head again...

310.45.text:
and one hand in front of the throat, because 
people do not like hands around their throats,

329.23.text:
So do one hand, 
over the top of the throat.

354.13.text:
Direct that energy into the lungs, the heart, 
the breasts, whatever you need to direct it into.

365.70.text:
So as you can see there 
is plenty of clearance.

374.30.text:
Just spend about two or three 
minutes to this area.

388.60.text: Onto the top of the stomach.

395.05.text:
Some women do not like their stomachs being 
healed (Hands On) that's why I asked!

404.29.text:
Now you can direct healing,
when giving healing.

406.95.text:
You know somebody has 
got a heart conditions,

409.55.text:
you just send that healing 
down into the heart.

412.74.text:
So your mind can direct it 
to where it needs to go.

415.77.text: It comes in the most purest form,

418.11.text:
It is already in the best form it should be, 
for that patients needs.

422.74.text:
So you just let it flow, 
you do not have to manipulate it,

426.74.text:
or change it, or put 
different colours with it.

431.11.text:
So just let it flow through 
you to the patient.

439.05.text:
And we move down,
onto the stomach area.

448.33.text:
Again two or three minutes, up to
four minutes in each area.

452.70.text:
Some healings last half 
an hour to 45 minutes,

455.88.text: it depends on the patient and the healer.

469.18.text: So over the top of the pelvis.

471.70.text:
You do not heal, breasts,
you do not heal the posterior (bottom)

478.24.text:
and you do not heal over the pelvis here 
with your hand on, you keep your hands off,

482.82.text:
and don't heal on the inner thigh, 
of men or women.

486.65.text:
Now! Of course you do not heal over 
the breast of women (hand on),

489.70.text:
but with men you can heal their chest 
completely and their stomach as well.
(Hands On)

500.41.text:
So now I will just move 
to healing the shoulder.

511.18.text: its important to, heal all the joints.

515.27.text:
Because obviously because
they get wear and tear.

519.17.text:
A lot of people get joint 
pain, later on in life.

531.68.text:
You find your own method of healing,
how you want to go about it.

535.46.text:
You need to find a methodical way 
that you do with each patient.

539.55.text:
Now the elbow, you can use both 
hands to just heal the elbow.

544.44.text:
Just spend a couple of minutes on the 
arm unless there is a problem.

553.26.text:
Then just one hand on the 
forearm and hand.

562.06.text:
As I say it is important to wash 
your hands before you start,

566.37.text:
and between each patient, I use a antibacterial 
soap, that I just wash my hands with.

571.47.text:
Otherwise you can spread diseases,
the common cold often.

579.26.text:
Right you can just heal on the 
inside here of the waist...

585.86.text:
and just one hand over 
the top of the hip.

597.40.text:
So again another couple 
of minutes doing this.

605.98.text:
So I am working down Jess's right
 hand side at the moment...

611.18.text:
and just move down, 
another hand on the hip, flat.

619.25.text:
I say! Keep your hand away 
from the inner thigh,

621.53.text:
until you get down to the knee,
then you are fine.

628.71.text:
So it is just a methodical way 
of working your way down.

640.16.text:
Now say for instance Jess had 
hurt herself in a sports event...

644.96.text: and pulled a ligament in her knee,

647.56.text:
at the moment I have just 
got one hand on there.

650.20.text:
So the best thing to do, is to have 
two hands, one underneath on above...

655.26.text:
and give that some intense 
healing for a bit longer,

657.74.text:
instead of 30 seconds to a minute, 
maybe a couple of minutes there.

675.43.text: So you do this in your own time.

685.20.text:
Just heal the top of the foot that's fine, 
unless there is a particular problem on the bottom.

702.94.text:
Again I am going to do 
the shoulder and arm.

719.69.text:
The healing builds up into you the first couple 
of minutes you tune in and start channelling it,

725.56.text:
and then you find, you have got your hands
on say the patients shoulders or head,

731.26.text:
it suddenly begin to flow and you
can feel it flowing to the patient...

736.61.text: and then you stay in that area,

739.73.text:
and flow and warmth on your hand 
of the energy, going into the patient...

745.12.text:
and then, when there is 
enough healing in that area,

747.98.text:
you can feel the flow stop 
and the heat becomes cooler...

751.26.text:
So you know its then time to move on 
the next area you are going to heal.

755.12.text: So again, move on to the joint.

767.77.text:
I say just take a minute 
or two, to heal the arm.

770.45.text: So again good healing for the joint.

792.80.text:
So you would spend a bit 
longer than I am doing this.

799.81.text: Again if you fell the need,

802.00.text:
just middle of the stomach 
and over the chest again.

806.88.text:
Plenty of healing into 
the lungs and heart.

818.79.text:
Then again over the hip and 
side of the waist again.

826.26.text:
And a lot of healing will going 
into the lungs as well.

833.08.text:
But you are healing the stomach, 
intestines and everything.

841.53.text:
Then move on, the hip joint 
very important to heal.

870.01.text:
So you would be spending a 
bit longer than this.

877.20.text:
Just let the energy keep 
flowing through you.

886.16.text:
use a crystal to go over the patient body before they start, 
where it start spinning they know there is a need of healing.

892.40.text:
But again there is another 
way of doing that...

895.57.text: You can just run your hands,

899.88.text: over the patient, in their aura...

902.95.text: and if there is a need of healing anywhere,

905.82.text:
you will feel a hot spot, you will 
feel more heat coming on your hands.

919.80.text:
Don't jolt your patient awake, just 
gently tap them on the shoulder...

925.54.text: and ask them to sit up.

927.35.text:
If you could just sit up for a second 
and just support yourself.

930.75.text:
Ok? I am just going to let this 
down so you can turn over.

946.24.text:
Ok if you could just roll over 
and lay on your front!

948.26.text: If you just rest you face on your hand.

957.38.text:
Can I just get you a bit straighter 
on the bed, that's it thanks.

965.37.text:
So now!
Just heal the back of the neck,

969.79.text: you do not go onto the posterior again,

971.80.text:
again you have your hand 
two to three inches off.

975.15.text:
So you do not want to heal 
the very base of the spine.

979.60.text:
Just you hand there,
onto the spine.

982.60.text:
So your not on the 
very base of the spine...

985.33.text:
and that is letting healing travel all 
the way up the spine and back.

989.66.text:
So the spine is very important, it 
connects the whole body to the brain.

998.07.text:
You can just use your 
fingertips if you want to.

1016.06.text:
I say just two or three minutes
and then heal the actual shoulder blades.

1031.52.text: So just a couple of minutes,

1033.35.text:
three minutes maybe healing 
both shoulder blades.

1052.38.text:
You can heal either side 
of the back as well.

1072.76.text:
Again not healing on the 
inner thighs at all.

1082.51.text:
So hands off or to the side 
going down these legs.

1088.08.text:
So hands off healing, is nearly as 
effective as hands on healing.

1093.74.text:
A lot of patients like to feel 
the healer actually touching them.

1098.97.text:
So I will just do the backs of 
the knees again, hands on.

1104.79.text: So I say spend two or three minutes.

1107.22.text:
But realise that if you are 
healing on a healing bed...

1110.89.text:
that patient is not going to be able to turn 
over very well if they are getting on in years...

1115.19.text:
or got a bad back or 
whatever it might be.

1117.61.text:
So they might want sit up on 
the side to have healing.

1123.76.text: I mean Jess is young and agile.

1127.10.text:
You just get them to put their legs over the 
side and healing the back with them sitting up,
which I will demonstrate in a minute.

1136.57.text:
Now healing on a chair you healing 
their head again first.

1139.86.text: Tune in with your hands on their shoulders.

1142.57.text:
So heal the head first, then the back 
and then find your own method.

1148.31.text:
So you are disturbing them because you need 
them to sit forward when you heal their back.

1156.57.text:
So again the ankles and you can just have 
your hands off on the bottom of the feet.

1171.85.text:
Ok Jess! If you could turn over the 
way you were originally sitting...

1175.17.text:
put your legs over that side and just 
sit back as far as you can on there.

1183.58.text: So over the top of the shoulders...

1194.90.text: and move unto again the shoulders...

1202.64.text:
and just heal the back of the head again, 
if you have got them sitting up.

1210.79.text:
Then the back of the neck,
base of the spine.

1225.08.text: So you will feel the flow start again,

1227.22.text:
when you move to a different area,
it dries up and goes cold,

1233.21.text:
then after maybe 30 seconds or so, you will feel 
the energy begin to flow again if there is a need.

1239.19.text: Which everybody has got a bit of a need...

1243.05.text:
and then again, after a 
little while it will go cold.

1246.21.text:
You will feel the flow stop when 
you become more attuned.

1248.97.text:
So then shoulder blades again if 
you are healing this way.

1263.41.text: Then just work your way down the back.

1271.45.text:
You just follow your own intuition 
when you need to move on.

1275.64.text:
So this is as I say just a
quick demonstration.

1280.27.text:
Then you can do the side 
of the rib cage again.

1285.11.text:
The waist again and if you wanted to 
you could do the hips again, like so!

1290.73.text: Now some healers like to brush off...

1295.95.text:
which is just brushing the aura 
brushing the shoulders.

1300.43.text:
To try and get any residues 
out of the aura.

1303.63.text:
Which is fair enough of you want to do that,
there is no real necessity to.

1307.56.text:
But when you have healed somebody, 
you are healing them through their spirit...

1311.81.text:
and you can open their charka 
system and spirit up a bit more.

1314.92.text: So at the end of healing,

1316.92.text:
You whether they are laying down, you 
just go over them if they are laying down.

1320.50.text: Where as Jess is here sitting up,

1324.61.text:
So, you bring your hands 
over the top of the head,

1328.59.text:
and you close the 
charka system down,

1331.16.text:
which is above the head, 
within the mind, within the body...

1338.11.text:
you just run your hands down,
smoothing the aura...

1341.19.text:
and just closing them back 
down to a normal state.

1352.70.text:
That's a general guide to 
channelling the healing...

1358.08.text:
to the methods of 
applying the healing...

1360.61.text:
and you find your own methods, 
once you get going,

1365.43.text:
but as rule of thumb, that's 
the general thing to do!

1368.92.text:
Anyway I hope you enjoyed that and 
hope it was useful in someway!

1375.63.text:
And we will see you soon!
Love and Light Neil!
(CC by NCC)
